byline.contributor: Sasha von Oldershausen contributed reporting from Presidio, Tex.
byline.original: By ALAN BLINDER and MANNY FERNANDEZ

abstract: Cibolo Creek Ranch owner John B Poindexter describes, in interview, discovery of body of Justice Antonin Scalia, saying he knew immediately upon entering Scalia's suite that he was deceased.

headline.print_headline: Owner of Texas Ranch Recalls Finding Justice’s Body
headline.main: Ranch Owner Recalls Finding Justice Antonin Scalia’s Body

snippet: Justice Scalia had arrived at the Cibolo Creek Ranch on Friday and was remembered as “very congenial, very convivial” by the ranch’s owner as a group roamed the property and some hunted quail.
lead_paragraph: Justice Scalia had arrived at the Cibolo Creek Ranch on Friday and was remembered as “very congenial, very convivial” by the ranch’s owner as a group roamed the property and some hunted quail.
